item.title: Randomness Uncontrolled
item.description: Set random seed explicitly during the development process whenever a possible random procedure is involved in the application.

item.title: Data Leakage
item.description: Use Pipeline() API in Scikit-Learn or check data segregation carefully when using other libraries to prevent data leakage.

item.title: Threshold-Dependent Validation
item.description: Use threshold-independent metrics instead of threshold-dependent ones in model evaluation.

item.title: DataLoader Unused
item.description: Use DataLoader to load the data in PyTorch instead of splitting data manually and feed into the network.
